LanguageData.Blueprint_MedTimes_StoneQuarry.label: Stone Quarry (blueprint)

LanguageData.Frame_MedTimes_StoneQuarry.label: Stone Quarry (building)
LanguageData.Frame_MedTimes_StoneQuarry.description: A Stone Quarry equipped with various tools used for the mining of coal, as well as the production of various types of stone chunks.
LanguageData.Frame_SW_CoalGenerator.label: Steam Engine Dynamo (building)
LanguageData.Frame_SW_CoalGenerator.description: A large dynamo powered by a steam engine that burns coal to produce power. Has a chance to combust when damaged.
LanguageData.Frame_Telegraph.label: telegraph station (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Telegraph.description: The telegraph station allows communcication with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
LanguageData.Frame_WireTransferBeacon.label: wire transfer beacon (building)
LanguageData.Frame_WireTransferBeacon.description: Required for wired monetary transactions via the telegraph station. Can be placed indoors.
